message: Happy Birthday, my sweetheart!
I hope your day is as wonderful in every way as you are 😊
You are quite a cutie 😘
🕺 I enjoy dancing with you so much 💃
I can't wait until we get a chance to dance together again
I love you, Shortcake 🍰
You're always extremely loving 🥰
The love I give you is a reflection
You're smarter than you give yourself credit
You've got such a big heart 💓
And have got a hold of mine 🫀
I love you so much because your personality 💖
But 🍈🍈 are always a welcome bonus 😉
Don't let a number define you
You're youthful as ever in your body and in your soul 🌞
Not only are you so loving to me
You're also loved right back by me 😍
🦆 Mep mep mep 🦆
Roses can be white, so can a tulip
Legitimate question: How are your birthday flowers holding ip? 💐
I long always to feel the soft touch of your skin on mine
💡 Remember to get a new headlight for your car
I couldn't have dreamt of meeting someone as wonderful as you, Sam
I'm grateful to have you in my life 🙂
Tommy Boy, your favorite movie! 🤣
<q>You can get a good look at a butcher's ass by sticking your head up there. But, wouldn't you rather take his word for it?</q>
Your silky skin and hair are often in my thoughts
Even smoother than all your soft clothes and blankets
Your long, black, curly hair and dark brown eyes make my heart skip a beat every time
You're my one true love, April 😘
Great personality, great looks, great memories, ...
You're great all around 🤩
I think of you often, during all parts of the day 💭
Remembering all the great times we've had together
And imagining the even greater ones to come
Approche toi de moi
Monte le son plus fort
Je veux sentir <s>une dernière fois</s> encore une fois ton corps contre moi
You've been my first (😉) for quite a few things
Thank you for showing me so many new experiences 😙

futureSolutions.__comment: For the day Sam is driving to Orlando: Thurs April 7
message: Have a safe drive, my love 🏎
I'm so excited to be in your arms again 🤗

futureSolutions.__comment: For when I go to visit Sam, eventually
message: I am so looking forward to visiting you again
See you soon, my sweetheart 😘

futureSolutions.__comment: Try to put on April 25, Samdle 41
message: It's been seven months since we've been together
These seven months have been the best in my life, without a doubt
Looking forward to many more 💖
